legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy.intro: This app stores your account and workflow data to provide the core experience.
legal.privacy.dataWeCollect.title: Data we collect
legal.privacy.dataWeCollect.item1: Account identifiers from GitHub OAuth (e.g., user id, name, email if available).
legal.privacy.dataWeCollect.item2: Task and weekly review content that you create in the app.
legal.privacy.dataWeCollect.item3: Operational logs needed for debugging and reliability (optional: Sentry).
legal.privacy.howWeUse.title: How we use data
legal.privacy.howWeUse.item1: Authenticate you and protect your data from other users.
legal.privacy.howWeUse.item2: Persist tasks/reports so the workflow works across sessions and devices.
legal.privacy.security.title: Security
legal.privacy.security.desc: Authentication is handled via GitHub OAuth (Auth.js). Data is stored in Postgres via Prisma. Never enable test flags (AUTH_BYPASS/DEMO_TOOLS) in production.
legal.privacy.dataDeletion.title: Data deletion
legal.privacy.dataDeletion.desc: This portfolio build does not provide a self-serve account deletion flow yet. Demo data can be reset from Settings when demo tools are enabled.
legal.terms.title: Terms of Service
legal.terms.intro: By using this app, you agree to these terms.
legal.terms.asIs.title: As-is
legal.terms.asIs.desc: This app is provided as-is, without warranty or service level guarantees.
legal.terms.accounts.title: Accounts
legal.terms.accounts.desc: You are responsible for your account access. Do not share access tokens or sessions.
legal.terms.content.title: Your content
legal.terms.content.desc: You own the content you submit (tasks, weekly notes). You are responsible for what you store and share (e.g., to Slack).
